scripts.copy: ncp node_modules/bootstrap/scss _sass/bootstrap/ & ncp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.js assets/js/bootstrap.js & ncp node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.js assets/js/jquery.js
scripts.uglify: uglifyjs node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.js node_modules/instafeed.js/instafeed.js node_modules/masonry-layout/dist/masonry.pkgd.js node_modules/imagesloaded/imagesloaded.js assets/js/main.js -m -c -o assets/js/main.min.js
scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run uglify
